mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, APP_IMAGE_ID, WEB_IMAGE_ID, URL, STATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into BUSINESS_BANNER (ID, TITLE, APP_IMAGE_ID, WEB_IMAGE_ID, URL, STATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{webImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into BUSINESS_BANNER
ID,
TITLE,
APP_IMAGE_ID,
WEB_IMAGE_ID,
URL,
STATE,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
TYPE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update BUSINESS_BANNER
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_IMAGE_ID = #{appImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WEB_IMAGE_ID = #{webImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BUSINESS_BANNER set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_IMAGE_ID = #{appImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WEB_IMAGE_ID = #{webImageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from BUSINESS_BANNER
1 = 1
and TYPE = #{type}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
